AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Tired student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} grew tired with the endless competition at the Lighthouse. The body, worn out from studying day and night, was in such a frail state that it was no longer fit to even continue the struggle. {PAWN_pronoun} ultimately gave up and sought a different path.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Surface artist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Most Moyos are not familiar with the sights of the surface. {PAWN_nameDef} took advantage of this to create a work based on the surface world. However, since {PAWN_pronoun} is also one of the many who do not know the surface, the result was quite outlandish.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Little deliverer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the Lighthouse’s consumer culture, age does not matter. {PAWN_nameDef} needed some extra cash, so {PAWN_pronoun} took on errands that offered quick and easy money. {PAWN_pronoun} didn’t care at all about the contents of the deliveries. What mattered was the payment.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Shocked nurse
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} entered a specialized medical training facility to secure employment. There, {PAWN_pronoun} witnessed scenes too overwhelming for {PAWN_possessive} young mind to bear, leaving deep scars on {PAWN_possessive} heart.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Mute child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was unusually silent from a young age. It wasn’t merely that {PAWN_pronoun} chose not to speak; it was concerning enough that others feared there might be an issue with {PAWN_possessive} language abilities. In reality, {PAWN_pronoun} was simply more sensitive to the supernatural and communicated through telepathy. The only problem was that no one ever responded to {PAWN_possessive} telepathic messages.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Runaway kid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the Lighthouse, failure means obsolescence. {PAWN_nameDef} was under constant pressure to succeed, and unable to endure it, {PAWN_pronoun} eventually ran away. {PAWN_pronoun} struggled to survive on the streets until {PAWN_pronoun} was introduced to a "decent job."

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Housekeeper apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was recently hired as an apprentice housekeeper and, as such, was still quite inexperienced. To avoid losing the hard-earned job, {PAWN_pronoun} had to scrutinize every little detail. While this took a toll on {PAWN_possessive} mental health, it seems that {PAWN_pronoun} managed to hold onto the job.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Instant food enthusiast
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the highly commercialized society of the Lighthouse, even food is a fierce competition. {PAWN_nameDef} found joy in sampling the many instant foods that emerged from this competition. It’s a hobby that saves money and guarantees taste! And since there are no warnings about consumption, {PAWN_pronoun} assumes there are no health risks either.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Cadet
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: The regular army of the Lighthouse offers good pay and benefits, but the requirements are strict. {PAWN_nameDef} completed an educational program from a young age to join the regular army. During this process, {PAWN_pronoun} realized that handling weapons was quite enjoyable.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Corporate employee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the many companies that exist in the lighthouse, there are countless people like {PAWN_nameDef}. While the packaging may seem impressive, the reality is that they are just cheap labor. Like many others, {PAWN_pronoun} will simply receive a termination notice and will have to find another way to survive.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Bartender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is the owner of a small, tucked-away bar. While {PAWN_possessive} establishment served as a refuge for several regulars, the rising rent forced {PAWN_possessive} to also get involved in drug dealing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Club master
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After hard labor, a place to relieve stress is necessary. That place is {PAWN_nameDef}’s club. It offers not just alcohol, dancing, and music, but also a variety of drugs. {PAWN_possessive} club thrived and attracted the attention of many organization including gangs. While {PAWN_pronoun} gained significant benefits from these organizations, it wasn’t long before {PAWN_pronoun} had to flee from the club due to the pressures caused by them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Weapon manufacturer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Professional weapons like the Laminar firearms are rarely used in the Lighthouse due to their high cost and strict regulation by the Council. {PAWN_nameDef} was a worker at a factory that produced such weapons. Since most of these parts are high-value items that would lead to a lifetime of blood debts if damaged, the work always had to be done perfectly.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Pharmaceutical employee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} works at a pharmaceutical company in the Lighthouse. The many high-quality medications available in the Lighthouse are produced here. {PAWN_pronoun} knows that while these drugs might save some, they also harm others. {PAWN_pronoun} just believes that the net benefit of the results outweighs the harm.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Researcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Thanks to the Council's concentrated investment, Abysstech is advancing day by day. {PAWN_nameDef} is a researcher at the Lighthouse, expected to continuously deliver results. Fearing that declining performance might lead to a loss of support, {PAWN_pronoun} has been diving into increasingly dangerous experiments.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Astronomer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} gazed up at the cosmos from the depths of the sea. Although astronomy is a neglected field at the Lighthouse with no support from the Council, {PAWN_pronoun} worked tirelessly, dreaming of one day reaching the stars.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Wanderer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} left the vast prison of the Lighthouse to live on a submarine. Though {PAWN_pronoun} occasionally returned to the Lighthouse for maintenance and resupply, each visit only reaffirmed {PAWN_possessive} conviction. {PAWN_pronoun} is preparing for the day when {PAWN_pronoun} can finally escape the Lighthouse for good.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: To sustain the advancement and consumption at the Lighthouse, a large amount of minerals is required. {PAWN_nameDef} took up this dangerous but well-paying job. {PAWN_pronoun} planned to work only until {PAWN_pronoun} could retire from mining, but with medical expenses and other costs, retirement seems far off.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Core miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a notorious core miner of the Lighthouse. Wearing thick diving suits, {PAWN_pronoun} descends to the darkest depths to extract minerals, making it one of the most dreaded jobs in the Lighthouse. However, the high pay drew {PAWN_possessive} to this occupation, and {PAWN_pronoun} was assigned to mine hadal shards. {PAWN_pronoun} said that {PAWN_pronoun} went through a horrifying experience down in the shard trenches.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Mechanoid mantainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Mechanoids are essential workers who have been part of the Lighthouse’s history. {PAWN_nameDef} maintained these Mechanoids and suffered under the heavy workload it brought, developing a deep admiration for the tireless Mechanodoids, who, despite minor malfunctions, never seem to tire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Fixer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a fixer who takes on various contracts. By solving dirty and difficult jobs, {PAWN_pronoun} satisfies clients and earns a hefty reward, making it a win-win situation. However, when one of {PAWN_possessive} contracts went terribly wrong, {PAWN_pronoun} had to escape the Lighthouse to save {PAWN_possessive} life.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Bouncer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a bouncer at a nightclub. In a place with so many people, chaos was inevitable, and {PAWN_pronoun} was very effective at "persuading" drunks, druggies, and unruly customers. That is, until {PAWN_pronoun} was fired for a truly trivial reason.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Contracted doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} became a doctor through specialized training. Realizing that working with the general public wouldn’t be profitable, {PAWN_pronoun} decided to enter into a contract with a wealthy patron from the bottom levels.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Veteran nurse
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a veteran nurse who has weathered countless trials. Having witnessed horrific scenes and endured grueling work, {PAWN_pronoun} decided that suppressing emotions was the best way to avoid breaking down. Through this approach, {PAWN_pronoun} became a seasoned veteran.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Housekeeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Wealthy people can hire many services with their money. {PAWN_nameDef} was employed as a housekeeper, managing various household chores and errands. {PAWN_pronoun} was unable to resist the demands of the employer, who was socially and economically superior. As the employer's demands grew increasingly unreasonable, {PAWN_pronoun} could no longer endure it and eventually killed the employer and escaped.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Buoyant tail
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} found a method for earning money that is both fast and effective. With just a reasonable level of self-management and social skills, it’s a simple job of just slightly lifting a tail to {PAWN_possessive} customer. While some may criticize this approach, {PAWN_pronoun} is unbothered by their opinions. After all, while those critics can be fired at any time, {PAWN_possessive} clients show no signs of disappearing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Enforcer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} serves as an enforcer of the law and order in the Lighthouse. Dressed in uniform, {PAWN_pronoun} goes out to apprehend criminals and maintain public order. Enforcers like {PAWN_nameDef} have various nicknames, the most famous of which is "The Barnacle Cleaner." This nickname comes from their role in clearing out vagrants and beggars who settle in flooded zones and other areas, keeping the environment clean. Many residents of the middle level appreciate the efforts of enforcers like {PAWN_nameDef} for maintaining cleanliness and order.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a member of the Lighthouse's regular army, trained to a professional standard. Due to the nature of the Lighthouse, the regular army is rarely deployed, so {PAWN_pronoun} has mostly been assigned to support the enforcers. Many within the Lighthouse question the necessity of a regular army due to the costs involved, but the wise understands that the presence of the regular army, the most powerful military force in the Lighthouse, that ensures order is maintained in this chaotic place.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Army officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was enjoying a very comfortable life as an officer in the regular army. However, this soon degenerated into debauchery, and {PAWN_pronoun} devised a plan to make a big score for downward mobility. Naturally, this plan failed, and {PAWN_pronoun} hurriedly left the Lighthouse before the situation could worsen.
